languages.text: "Братья свидетельствуют. А значит, пора нам повстречать моего последнего товарища".
"The brothers bear witness. Which means it is time for us to meet my last comrade."
languages.original_text: "Братья свидетельствуют. А значит, пора нам повстречать моего последнего товарища".

traits.locale_text: "The brothers bear witness. Which means it is time for us to meet my last comrade."
"The brothers bear witness. Which means it is time for us to meet my last comrade."
"The brothers bear witness. Which means it is time for us to meet my last comrade."
"The brothers bear witness. Which means it is time for us to meet my last comrade."

languages.text: “我的兄弟在此见证，是时候去见我们最后的战友了。”
languages.original_text: "The brothers bear witness. Which means it is time for us to meet my last comrade."

traits.locale_text: “我的兄弟在此见证，是时候去见我们最后的战友了。”

languages.text: 「同胞が証人となる。つまり、最後の仲間と対峙するときが来たということだ」
languages.original_text: "The brothers bear witness. Which means it is time for us to meet my last comrade."

traits.locale_text: 「同胞が証人となる。つまり、最後の仲間と対峙するときが来たということだ」

languages.text: «Los hermanos son testigos. Así que es el momento de reunirnos con mi último camarada».
languages.original_text: "The brothers bear witness. Which means it is time for us to meet my last comrade."

traits.locale_text: «Los hermanos son testigos. Así que es el momento de reunirnos con mi último camarada».

languages.text: « Mes frères sont venus assister à ce qui va suivre. Il est donc temps d'aller à la rencontre de mon dernier camarade. »
languages.original_text: "The brothers bear witness. Which means it is time for us to meet my last comrade."

traits.locale_text: « Mes frères sont venus assister à ce qui va suivre. Il est donc temps d'aller à la rencontre de mon dernier camarade. »

languages.text: "Die Brüder sind Zeugen. Das bedeutet, es wird Zeit, meinen letzten Kameraden zu treffen."
languages.original_text: "The brothers bear witness. Which means it is time for us to meet my last comrade."

traits.locale_text: "Die Brüder sind Zeugen. Das bedeutet, es wird Zeit, meinen letzten Kameraden zu treffen."

languages.text: "Kardeşlerim şahitlik ediyorlar. Yani son yoldaşımla buluşma vaktimiz geldi."
languages.original_text: "The brothers bear witness. Which means it is time for us to meet my last comrade."

traits.locale_text: "Kardeşlerim şahitlik ediyorlar. Yani son yoldaşımla buluşma vaktimiz geldi."
